recipe.title: Boothbay Blueberry Sauce
instructions: Stir the lemon juice, orange rind, orange juice and sugar in a large pot. Bring to a rolling boil. Add berries and bring to a full boil again. Add cinnamon, cloves and pectin and boil hard, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Remove from heat, pour into hot, sterilized jars, cover and seal.
